title: Services to enhance the innovation management capacity of SMEs in the macro-region 1 in Romania
objective: The objectives of this proposal are the following:Increase efficiency and effectiveness of innovation processes of local beneficiaries of SME instrument and SMEs with significant innovation activities and high potential for internationalisation;Facilitate SMEís access to consulting services for innovation management to address bottlenecks to creation of economic impact;Support innovative SMEís to raise the companyís profitability and competitiveness on international markets.
participants: AGENTIA PENTRU DEZVOLTARE REGIONALA CENTRU;NATIONAL INSTITUTE OF RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT FOR OPTOELECTRONICS;UNIVERSITATEA TEHNICA CLUJ-NAPOCA;INSTITUTULUI NATIONAL DE CERCETARE DE ZVOLTARE PENTRU INGENERIE ELECTRICA ICPE - CA BUCURESTI;CAMERA DE COMERT SI INDUSTRIE BRASOV
